QuestData.Title: Keeping the Alliance Blind
QuestData.Description: The Alliance is tenacious, I'll give them that, but it'll take more than that to stop us. Take this SGM-3 with you and shoot down the Skybreaker's recon fighters once again.$B$BI doubt the message will get through their thick skulls, but there are enough missiles to keep trying to get our point across. Go and find their fighters flying above the Valley of Fallen Heroes, west of Aldur'thar, and don't come back until you've made wreckage of them.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the SGM-3 to destroy 6 Skybreaker Recon Fighters, then report back to Sky-Reaver Korm Blackscar aboard Orgrim's Hammer.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, once again. Horde superiority is assured, at least until those Alliance pukes decide to challenge us again.
